name: 陳殿禮
objective:
本課程係透過對文化之研究與解析，解構出具備設計發展之要素，並藉由設計專題之研討，實際應用文化意涵進行設計創作，發展出具創新之商品與服務，藉以培養學生對各種文化之解析能力，與設計應用之能力。
This course focuses on the deconstruction of design element through the study and analysis of culture. This course also focuses on the training of students’ ability of multiple-culture analysis and design application through the design topic seminar and cultural-meaning-applied design practice that develop innovative products and service.
